name: AR VDNH
description: An official augmented reality app for open-air exposure of military and special equipment within the Exhibition of Achievements of the National Economy.  Assisted by the app, you will be able to see 3D Russian military equipment models.  To launch the app you need to point the smartphone/tablet camera at the augmented reality marker  close to military equipment models within the Exhibition of Achievements of the National Economy.  May 9th, 70th anniversary, Victory Day, World War II, Exhibition of Achievements of the National  Economy, Exhibition Centre, Augmented Reality.
